pageProduct.name: Palmers Scar Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Scar Serum combines five powerful ingredients to reduce the appearance of scars resulting from surgery, injury, burns, acne, stretch marks and insect bites.
* Cocoa Butter - a superior moisturiser known to diminish the appearance of marks and scars.

* Vitamin E - a powerful antioxidant that is helpful in reducing scars (24,000 IU's).

* Allium Cepa - helps diminish scar matrix.

This concentrated serum penetrates quickly while forming a moisture-proof barrier.

Ingredients

Tocopheryl Acetate

Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter

Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil

Dimethicone

Allium Cepa (Onion) Bulb Extract

Directions

Apply 3-4 times daily to affected areas. Massage in.
